help-file.title: GUILDHALLS
help-file.content:
After you start a guild you will most likely want to start saving money to start building your guild somewhere to hang out and organize your next adventuring trip. For this purpose you can build your guild a guildhall. The cost involved in building your guildhall are as follows:
Golem (Sorc, Cleric, Warrior) 10,000 platinum Shopkeeper 10,000 platinum Inn 5,000 platinum Fountain 500 platinum Holy/Unholy Fountain 3,000 platinum Magic Mouth DISABLED 500 platinum Healing Room 3,000 platinum Chest 5,000 platinum Guildhall Rooms 1,000 platinum Portals 20,000 platinum
For further information on how to construct your guildhall and these items within your guildhalls, read the details in the construct section.
